channel.title: Project on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Project on Notes

item.title: NPM Module - Complex JSON to Query String
item.description:
@abskmj/query

It is an NPM module that converts complex JSON with arrays and nested objects into URL parameters or query string. It can also parse such query string back to JSON.

item.title: Status of Indian Railway PNR on Facebook Messenger
item.description:
Bhaina Bot

Bhaina is a facebook messenger based chat bot that helps you with current status of any Indian Railway PNR. You don’t have to install any extra application on your mobile to use this service.
